attributes.action: Students that got a grade 5 at GCSE  mock  should not be failed .
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair on student that had got a 5 in mock but still failing the gcse even though they had proved in the mocks that they are capable to pass.
attributes.background: A lot of student got downgraded by teachers as well even though they got a 5 in mock with clearly shows that they are capable of passing.This clearly shows favouritism of teachers .
